entry.title: Adding New BIP Editors
entry.summary: In a recent discussion, the endorsement of Roasbeef as a candidate was prominently supported. The conversation highlighted the need for clarity and organization within the thread. It was suggested that creating a comprehensive list of all proposed candidates would greatly benefit those involved in the decision-making process. This would enable participants to have a clearer understanding of their options and facilitate more informed thinking regarding the selection of suitable candidates.
